app.name: Mandelbrot for Wii
app.long_description:
This is a Mandelbrot set generator, you could have seen them on other platforms as well e.g. FractInt for PC.
A - zoom B - reset -,+ - change palette 1,2 - change number of iterations DOWN - run cycling palette HOME - back to HBC
v1.3 - cycling palette v1.2 - major speedup thanks to Dashxdr v1.1 - wiimote friendly
